languages.text: "Однако культ Последнего восхода — нечто большее, чем горстка заблуждающихся гадалок и провидцев. Они тайно распределяют агентов по Простору Коронус, распространяя ересь среди жителей имперских миров. В их действиях прослеживается определенная тактика, которая меняется, когда мы подбираемся слишком близко. И, наконец, у них хватает военной силы, чтобы два корабля, отправленных по их следам, были позже обнаружены в виде обломков".

traits.locale_text: "Однако Культ последнего восхода — нечто большее, чем горстка заблуждающихся гадалок и провидцев. Они тайно распределяют агентов по Простору Коронус, распростроняя ересь среди жителей имперских миров. В их действиях прослеживается определенная тактика, которая меняется, когда мы подбираемся слишком близко. И, наконец, у них хватает военной силы, чтобы два корабля, отправленных по их следам, были позже обнаружены в виде обломков".

languages.text: "However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to have had the two ships that we had sent after them later discovered as wreckage."
languages.original_text: "Однако культ Последнего восхода — нечто большее, чем горстка заблуждающихся гадалок и провидцев. Они тайно распределяют агентов по Простору Коронус, распространяя ересь среди жителей имперских миров. В их действиях прослеживается определенная тактика, которая меняется, когда мы подбираемся слишком близко. И, наконец, у них хватает военной силы, чтобы два корабля, отправленных по их следам, были позже обнаружены в виде обломков".

traits.locale_text: "However, Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a bunch of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain tactic to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to ensure the two vessels we sent after them were later discovered as wreckage."

"However, Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a bunch of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain tactic to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to ensure the two vessels we sent after them were later discovered as wreckage."

"However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to ensure the two vessels we sent after them were later discovered in pieces."

"However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to ensure the two vessels we sent after them were later discovered in pieces."

"However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to have had the two ships that we had sent after them later discovered as wreckage."

languages.text: «Sin embargo, el Culto del Amanecer Final es más que una banda de videntes y adivinos descarriados. Han extendido sus redes de agentes por la Extensión de Koronus, propagando la herejía entre la gente honrada de los mundos imperiales. Siguen alguna estrategia que cambia cada vez que nos acercamos a ellos. Y, por si fuera poco, tienen suficiente poder como para destruir las dos naves que hemos enviado contra ellos hasta el momento».
languages.original_text: "However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to have had the two ships that we had sent after them later discovered as wreckage."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, el Culto del Amanecer Final es más que una banda de videntes y adivinos descarriados. Han extendido sus redes de agentes por la Extensión de Koronus, propagando la herejía entre la gente honrada de los mundos imperiales. Siguen alguna estrategia que cambia cada vez que nos acercamos a ellos. Y, por si fuera poco, tienen suficiente poder como para destruir las dos naves que hemos enviado contra ellos hasta el momento».

languages.text: “然而，终末黎明可绝对不是一群误入歧途的预言家或占卜师，他们的规模更大。他们巧妙地将他们的代理人散布在科罗努斯扩区各地，在帝国世界的诚实民众之中散播异端邪说。他们的行动很有策略性，每当我们追查得太紧，他们就会改变战术。不仅如此，他们还有相当程度的军事力量。我们之前派出过两艘舰船追捕他们，但当我们找到这两艘船的时候，它们已经变成了残骸。”
languages.original_text: "However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to have had the two ships that we had sent after them later discovered as wreckage."

traits.locale_text: “然而，终末黎明可绝对不是一群误入歧途的预言家或占卜师，他们的规模更大。他们巧妙地将他们的代理人散布在科罗努斯星域各地，在帝国世界的诚实民众之中散播异端邪说。他们的行动很有策略性，每当我们追查得太紧，他们就会改变战术。不仅如此，他们还有相当程度的军事力量。我们之前派出过两艘舰船追捕他们，但当我们找到这两艘船的时候，它们已经变成了残骸。”

languages.text: 「しかし最後の夜明け教団は、見当違いの予言者や占い師の集まりよりも厄介です。奴らはインペリアルワールドの素直な民に異端を広め、コロヌス・エクスパンス中にうまく手先を増やしています。その手口には確かな戦略があり、こちらが近づくたびに変わるのです。そしてついに、奴らの追跡に送った船2隻が、後々ボロボロになって見つかるほどの軍事力をつけてしまいました」
languages.original_text: "However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to have had the two ships that we had sent after them later discovered as wreckage."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし最後の夜明け教団は、見当違いの予言者や占い師の集まりよりも厄介です。奴らはインペリアルワールドの素直な民に異端を広め、コロヌス・エクスパンス中にうまく手先を増やしています。その手口には確かな戦略があり、こちらが近づくたびに変わるのです。そしてついに、奴らの追跡に送った船2隻が、後々ボロボロになって見つかるほどの軍事力をつけてしまいました」

languages.text: "Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung ist allerdings weit mehr als das Geschwätz fehlgeleiteter Seher und Wahrsager. Sie verteilen ihre Agenten geschickt in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung, um unter den ehrbaren Bewohnern der imperialen Welten ihre ketzerischen Ideen zu verbreiten. Ihr Handeln unterliegt einer gewissen Strategie, die sich ändert, sobald wir ihnen zu nahe kommen. Außerdem verfügen sie über eine militärische Schlagkraft, die ausgereicht hat, die beiden Schiffe, die sie verfolgt hatten, in Wracks zu verwandeln."
languages.original_text: "However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to have had the two ships that we had sent after them later discovered as wreckage."

traits.locale_text: "Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung ist allerdings weit mehr als das Geschwätz fehlgeleiteter Seher und Wahrsager. Sie verteilen ihre Agenten geschickt in der gesamten Koronus Expanse, um unter den ehrbaren Bewohnern der imperialen Welten ihre ketzerischen Ideen zu verbreiten. Ihr Handeln unterliegt einer gewissen Strategie, die sich ändert, sobald wir ihnen zu nahe kommen. Außerdem verfügen sie über eine militärische Schlagkraft, die ausgereicht hat, die beiden Schiffe, die sie verfolgt hatten, in Wracks zu verwandeln."

languages.text: « Cependant, le Culte de l'Aube finale n'est pas qu'un simple ramassis d'augures et de diseurs de bonne aventure malavisés. Ces fous disséminent habilement leurs agents dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus afin de répandre l'hérésie parmi les honnêtes citoyens des mondes impériaux. Leurs actions s'inscrivent dans une certaine stratégie qui change chaque fois qu'ils nous sentent approcher d'un peu trop près. Qui plus est, ils disposent d'une puissance militaire assez grande pour détruire les deux vaisseaux que nous avions envoyés à leur poursuite. »
languages.original_text: "However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to have had the two ships that we had sent after them later discovered as wreckage."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, le Culte de l'Aube finale n'est pas qu'un simple ramassis d'augures et de diseurs de bonne aventure malavisés. Ces fous disséminent habilement leurs agents dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus afin de répandre l'hérésie parmi les honnêtes citoyens des mondes impériaux. Leurs actions s'inscrivent dans une certaine stratégie qui change chaque fois qu'ils nous sentent approcher d'un peu trop près. Qui plus est, ils disposent d'une puissance militaire assez grande pour détruire les deux vaisseaux que nous avions envoyés à leur poursuite. »

languages.text: "Nihai Şafak Tarikatı, kafasınca hareket eden kâhinlerden ve falcılardan daha fazlasıdır. Ajanlarını Koronus Enginliği'ne dikkatle yayıyor, İmparatorluk dünyalarındaki dürüst insanlar arasında kâfirlik tohumları ekiyorlar. Faaliyetlerinin belirli bir stratejisi var ve ne zaman onları yakalamaya yaklaşsak bu stratejilerini değiştiriyorlar. Son olarak da askerî güçleri de azımsanmamalı, peşlerinden iki gemi gönderip sonrasında bunların enkazına denk gelmiştik."
languages.original_text: "However, the Cult of the Final Dawn is something greater than a gaggle of misguided seers and fortune-tellers. They cleverly spread their agents all over the Koronus Expanse, disseminating heresy among honest people on the Imperial worlds. There is a certain strategy to their actions that changes whenever we get too close. And finally, they have enough military power to have had the two ships that we had sent after them later discovered as wreckage."

traits.locale_text: "Yine de Nihai Şafak Tarikatı kafasınca hareket eden kâhinlerden ve falcılardan daha fazlasıdır. Ajanlarını Koronus Enginliği'ne dikkatle yayıyor, İmparatorluk dünyalarındaki dürüst insanlar arasında kâfirlik tohumları ekiyorlar. Faaliyetlerinin belli bir stratejisi var ve onları yakalamaya ne zaman yaklaşsak bu stratejilerini değiştiriyorlar. Son olarak, askerî güçleri de azımsanmamalı, peşlerinden gönderdiğimiz iki geminin daha sonra enkazına denk gelmiştik."
